_description: ContentForge Humanization Patterns — AI writing signatures to detect and remove

filler_phrases: at the end of the day

too_uniform.description: AI often creates sentences of similar length. Human writing varies.
too_uniform.fix: Mix short punchy sentences with longer flowing ones. Vary rhythm.

too_balanced.description: AI loves perfectly balanced clauses. Humans don't.
too_balanced.example: X is important, Y is crucial, and Z is essential.
too_balanced.fix: Break symmetry. One short. Another long and winding with clauses.

overuse_of_lists.description: AI defaults to bulleted lists. Humans mix formats.
overuse_of_lists.detection_threshold: More than 40% of content as lists
overuse_of_lists.fix: Convert some lists to narrative paragraphs with connective tissue.

predictable_structure.fix: Start with your main point. Open with a story. Put best idea first.

sentence_variety.description: Vary sentence length: 20% short (5-10 words), 50% medium (11-20), 30% long (21+)

questions.placement: After making a point, to engage reader

direct_address.description: Use 'you' instead of 'one' or passive voice

sentence_fragments.placement: After a complete thought. For punch.

dashes_and_parentheticals.example: Use a dash — like this — to add extra thought

starting_with_and_or_but.example: But here's the thing. And that's not all.

witty.example: SEO isn't rocket science. (Though rocket scientists probably do SEO.)

authoritative.example: The data is clear: 73% of marketers see ROI within 90 days.

warm.example: We've all been there — staring at a blank page, deadline looming.

educational.example: Think of it like this: SEO is a marathon, not a sprint.

read_aloud_test.description: Read draft aloud. If you stumble, rewrite that phrase.

examples: So what does this mean for you?

paragraph_flow.description: Mix 1-2 sentence paragraphs with 4-5 sentence ones

burstiness.description: Perplexity (word choice variety) and burstiness (sentence length variety) are key AI detection signals

unexpected_word_choices.description: AI uses statistically probable words. Humans occasionally choose unexpected synonyms.
unexpected_word_choices.technique: Replace 10-15% of common words with less common but accurate synonyms

specific_examples.description: AI generalizes. Humans cite specific instances.
specific_examples.example: Instead of 'companies', say 'We worked with a SaaS startup that...'

seo_keyword_protection.description: Humanization must NOT reduce keyword density below threshold
seo_keyword_protection.fallback: If SEO score drops, loop back to Phase 6

factual_accuracy_protection.description: Humanization must NOT alter facts, citations, or data

brand_voice_protection.description: Humanization must enhance (not replace) brand voice
